name: FireRoom
description:
This is my first game, I used itch. io material and some sprites drawn by myself

Explore the dark cave and delivery the fire ：）

In the range of fire, time and space will be distorted, and your mission is to spread the fire

在火的范围内，时空会被扭曲，而你的使命就是传火

Controls

WASD  to move

E-interact

R-restart

Space-jump

（Special thanks to Google Translate）
